cast.name: 皮特·麦克佛森 Peter McPherson
詹姆斯·巴特林 James Buttling

introduction: 詹姆斯把最后一杯酒放在吧台上，旁边是一个英俊的陌生人，他们的目光短暂相遇。不久，詹姆斯在男厕所遇到了陌生人卡尔，决定在外面的街上等他。詹姆斯开车送卡尔回到他的公寓，在那里他透露说，他已经认识他，因为他服务他的汽车。詹姆斯吻了卡尔，他们在一起过了一夜。早晨，卡尔被内疚折磨着，殴打詹姆斯，让他在床上流血不止。James places his last drink on the bar next to a handsome stranger, their eyes briefly meet. Shortly after James encounters the stranger, Carl, in the men's toilet and decides to wait for him outside in the street. James drives Carl back to his apartment where he reveals that he already knew him since he services his car. James kisses Carl and they spend a night together. In the morning Carl is racked with guilt and assaults James leaving him beaten and bleeding on the bed.@爱看电影的浩浩
